data: For all encounters, offer: Take Home Naloxone Training and Kit, Outpatient Rapid Access Addiction Clinic referral, or local addictions outreach resource if available. Consider calling BCCSU 24-7 Emergency Line (778-945-7619)
Select cloNIDine if patient is not interested in ED Buprenorphine-Naloxone (Suboxone) (Module)
0.1 mg, PO, q4h, PRN opioid withdrawal, drug form: tab
0.2 mg, PO, q4h, PRN opioid withdrawal, drug form: tab
If not eligible for buprenorphine-naloxone (SUBOXONE) and confirmed opioid use disorder - order immediate-release opioids
If severe withdrawal, or patient receiving iOAT in community, contact addiction service on call or BCCSU 24-7 Emergency Line (778-945-7619)
dose range: 20 to 30 mg, PO, q2h, PRN opioid withdrawal, drug form: oral liq
dose range: 20 to 40 mg, PO, q2h, PRN opioid withdrawal, drug form: oral liq
If renal dysfunction or on buprenorphine-naloxone (SUBOXONE)
dose range: 4 to 6 mg, PO, q2h, PRN opioid withdrawal, drug form: tab
dose range: 4 to 6 mg, PO, q2h, PRN opioid withdrawal, drug form: oral liq
dose range: 4 to 8 mg, PO, q2h, PRN opioid withdrawal, drug form: tab
dose range: 4 to 8 mg, PO, q2h, PRN opioid withdrawal, drug form: oral liq
If severe withdrawal or unable to tolerate PO
2 mg, IV, q20min, PRN opioid withdrawal, drug form: inj
1 kit, IM, once, drug form: kit, Dispense Take Home Medication, Dispense qty: 1 kit
Provide Harm Reduction Supplies. Nurse to review and document
